categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic legions

nodes.text: The 7th Legion was a division of the Grand Army of the Republic under the command of senior clone commander A'den during the Clone Wars. The 7th Legion was part of the 327th Star Corps, led by clone marshal commander Bly and Jedi General Aayla Secura. The 101st Regiment was part of the 7th Legion.
An action figure of a Clone trooper of the 7th Legion was released.
